name: Dugtrio
description: The Mole Pokémon. A team of triplets that can burrow to a depth of 60 miles. It’s reported that this triggers an earthquake.

abilities.name: Sand Veil
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to Sandstorm damage. In addition, its AC increases by 2 in desert terrain, or during a Sandstorm.

abilities.name: Arena Trap
abilities.description: Grounded creatures within 50 feet of this Pokémon may not flee or switch out, except by item, Move, or ability.

abilities.name: Sand Force
abilities.description: During a Sandstorm, this Pokémon can double its STAB when it hits an opponent.
